original: The Court mainly consists of various unlanded nobles, but also councilors (who can be landed vassals).\n\nRulers can house only a certain number of adult people in their court, depending on the tier of their Title. Beyond that number, §YCourt Expenses§! will increase.
translation: 宫廷主要由各色无地的贵族组成，但也包括内阁成员（他们可能是有地的封臣）。\n\n统治者能在宫廷中养的人的数量是有上限的，这个人数取决于他头衔的级别。如果超出那个人数上限，§Y宫廷维护费用§!将会上升。

original: The Court mainly consists of various unlanded nobles, but also councilors (who can be landed vassals).
translation: 宫廷主要包含没有封地的贵族，也有被委以要职的内阁成员（可能拥有领地）。
